title: Can I int lose games?
body:
So I can stay on Gold mmr, where its actually fun?

Being in Platinum is just so unfun to even be in

replies.body:
Theres a way you can just int game and not get banned i've seen it on consensual clown stream ad he didnt get banned for it:
So what you is just pick a champion that fits your role,build normal items,dont type in chat and just play like a bot don't literally run it down mid but play like a bot pretty much

All you have to do is duo/flex with some gold,silvers, and your mmr will drop a ton for a loss. if they were outplayed by the plat well, what you can say, They were like faker in their eyes, it was just too overwhelming for their thinking caps xd, shoulda farmed from fountain kappa.
You can but you will get a 14 day Ban and then a perma ban for it, so you can Level Back Up to gold. Yeah.
